title: The ultra-thin order-disordered CeO2 nanobelts as the non-carbon support of PtCu catalyst towards methanol oxidation and oxygen reduction reaction

The used of carbon support in direct methanol fuel cells easily leads to the shedding and poisoning of Pt catalyst and hence the decrease of catalytic activity. The non-carbon materials...
